page.title: 11THE EILDON HILLS (cont.)
page.content: In June during the Melrose Festival Week there is a race over the Eildons.Many excellent runners take part in this race and the record is 25.36 minutes. At the bottom of the Eildons there is Melrose Golf Course which was founded in 1880.It is only a small course with 9 holes.It is a very hilly course with fairly short holes. Pony trekking is also popular on the Eildons with Elywen Glen (just out of our area) being the local centre for it. Some people are granted licences to shoot rabbits and pheasants,although nowadays less licences are granted.The Duke of Buccleuch's Hunt sometimes uses the land around the Eildons.
